org.javaconfig.api

Interface PropertyValue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixedPropertyValue

    public interface PropertyValue
    Encapsulates a concrete configuration value.
    Author:
    Anatole Tresch

    • Method Detail

      • adapt

        <T> T adapt(java.lang.Class<PropertyAdapter<T>> adapterType)
        Adapt the property value, with the given adapter type.
        Parameters:
        type - The additional return type to be enabled for this instance.
        adapterType - The adapter class to be used.
        Returns:
        the adapted value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the adapter cannot be instantiated, or such an adapter is already registered.

      • adapt

        <T> T adapt(java.lang.Class<T> type,
          java.lang.Class<PropertyAdapter<? extends T>> adapterType)
        Adapt the property value, with the given adapter type.
        Parameters:
        type - The additional return type to be enabled for this instance.
        adapterType - The adapter class to be used.
        Returns:
        the adapted value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the adapter cannot be instantiated, or such an adapter is already registered.

      • getAdaptedTypes

        java.util.Set<java.lang.Class> getAdaptedTypes()
        Returns the list of non String value types, currently available on this item.
        Returns:
        the adapted types, never null.

      • getAdapter

        <T> PropertyAdapter<T> getAdapter(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Access a registered adapter for a type.
        Parameters:
        type - the target type.
        Returns:
        the PropertyAdapter registered, or null.
